fields.name: Usage: /help
fields.value: This command opens the help manual. You did that to get here.

fields.name: Next page
fields.value: This button switches to the next page in the manual.

fields.name: Prev page
fields.value: This button switches to the previous page in the manual.

fields.name: Jump to section
fields.value: Selecting an option will jump to the specified section in the manual.
